name: The French and Indian War
description: War in America (The French and Indian War) is a war game set in the 17th and 18th century's during the discovery period. It is a turn-based conquest game pitting 4 European nations and 16 Indian nations in an epic struggle for control of the east coast of North America. Use your armies to explore, conquer and settle new lands. Develop and build towns and villages, gather resources and trade with your neighbours to make treaties and alliances. You can play as either the Indian or European nations, using any one of the many great commanders to lead your army to victory or defeat.
